full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 88 of 247 LBUCmax3 Visoski - cross document, but I don't see Ms. Maxwell's name on there. It's just -- MS. COMEY: Your Honor, objection. THE COURT: Sustained. I'll have the jury disregarded observations of the document that are not in evidence other than to refresh his recollection, which we've moved beyond. MR. EVERDELL: Understood, your Honor. That's fine. Thank you, Mr. Visoski. We can take that down. BY MR. EVERDELL: Q. Mr. Visoski, I think you also flew Mr. Epstein a number of times to Columbus, Ohio; isn't that right? A. That's correct. Q. Columbus, Ohio is where Les Wexner lives? A. That's correct. Q. Les Wexner is the billionaire owner of the Limited? A. That's correct. Q. That's the clothing company? A. Yes. Q. It owns Victoria's Secret and Abercrombie & Fitch, among other companies? A. That's correct, yes. Q. And Les Wexner was a friend of Jeffrey Epstein's? A. I believe they were friends. Q. He was one of Epstein's clients, wasn't he? A. To my knowledge, Mr. Epstein would call him a client, yes. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011860
